website_summaries.verdict: From finishing small wood pieces to sanding entire decks, users are happy with its long-lived performance, good dust control and overall power.
pros: This powerful sander gets top marks for being easy to control, with minimal vibration during use
cons: A few reports of Velcro-attached sanding discs flying off during use
Replacing dust collector with Shop-Vac hose requires buying an additional part

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Had my round sand paper ready when it arrived and went to work. Great sander, doesn't dig down since it orbits really well. Got a picnic table done so fast I couldn't believe it!
customer_reviews.author: Clempsontiger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was my first project with this sander and it is amazing as you can tell by the photos. I had no issues with it whatsoever. The only thing (that all Sanders tend to have an issue with) is the dust catcher. It detaches easily, so easily that it tends to fall off, and the power cord is rather short. But the sander itself does the job flawlessly. I did have to let it sit every now and then after extensive use just because it started to get really warm; but I did not have any issues with it. I definitely recommend this. Pros: Quick Efficient Cons: Loose Dust catcher Short power cord
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, high quality and very POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a luxury of ease for the Hook-and-Loop replacement of the sanding pads. The sander is very powerful and robust. Remember to allow the sander to reach max speed before starting to sand. Starting this sander with the abrasive on your project (If sanding wood) will produce/cause scratch marks on the item and you more work....nuff said. Purchase with confidence
customer_reviews.author: Abe Froman

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With Dewalt Sander
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sander to replace a Craftsman RO unit that fell apart in my hand one day while sanding. This Dewalt sander is a pleasure to use. Vibration is minimal and discs stay on the sander longer than any other sander I've owned. Some reviewers complained that the dust bag did a poor job of collecting sawdust. I disagree. When the bag is properly connected to the sander, it does a very respectable job. Of course more sawdust would be collected if the sander was connected to a dust collector or shop vac. I would recommend this sander to anyone looking for a quality finishing sander.
customer_reviews.author: Jack N Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Velcro pad won't hold sanding disc after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews before buying this sander but didn't pay enough attention to all the people saying it won't hold the sanding disc very long. Now it's happening to me. After 3 weeks of use the velcro pad no longer holds the sanding disc. DeWalts solution, just buy a new pad for $25. You'll need a new pad around once a month. My solution is to use spray glue but it's a hassle. DeWalt used to be a good company. I'm going back to Porter Cable for a better orbital sander.
customer_reviews.author: hippyrick

customer_reviews.title: Orbits randomly while sanding
customer_reviews.text: Actually, randomly orbits while sanding which is a big improvement over the cheepo Black and Decker version I had before which left lots of squiggles in the wood no matter how slow I went. This product doesn’t leave them unless I’m moving too fast. Also, this is just my personal preference, but I prefer the solid on/off switch on this model. Some ROS have a pressure sensitive trigger, but your control over a project is better when you can simply turn the thing on and off manually.
customer_reviews.author: WashingtonthroughIdaho

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to return by date!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second dewalt sander I have had. The first one I received quit working after one use. It also had an odd clicking sound. Returning was super easy the first time. This one worked great, for ONE project. I just went to use it on something else and it won’t turn on. Extremely disappointed since this is such a well known brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I used this to sand down a kitchen table that I built.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Buy it... now.
customer_reviews.text: In short, the best sander i have ever used. The amount of control i get with this sander is unmatched. With one finger this baby glides across even the roughest of material with ease. I feel ZERO vibration on flat surfaces and have used this sander for several hours at a time and have never come close to that classic "numb sander hand" feeling. As annoying as the "adaptors" are for this sander's dust collection there is a quick fix. Strangely enough, the bosch sander adaptor is a perfect fit for this sander and allows for dust collection without the dumb attempts at dust collection from dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Blake L.

customer_reviews.title: best sander
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have run across many sanders that don't hold up to the level of work I put on them. I work part time in my shop and am in the studio every day. While not as powerful as my big sanders, this little guy works just as hard as some of my big tools and is the best sander. Would Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Powerful, and Clean-Finishing Sander
customer_reviews.text: Great little sander. It quickly puts a very even finish on your work. When you stain after using this sander, it will go on smooth and even, bringing out the grain of the wood. You don't get sander-marks. Work through the grits and this sander will work rapidly. My last one was great for ten years of hard use before giving out. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitri Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The price is very competitive and the machine has good dust pick-up when used with a shop vac
customer_reviews.text: Its Dewalt so not much else needs to be said. The price is very competitive and the machine has good dust pick-up when used with a shop vac. I've used it for several projects before this review and can say its a worthwhile investment.
customer_reviews.author: J. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it would not sand flat. It felt like the pad had a wobble like it was not fastened tight. It sanded with a grabbing affect with any grit paper and would leave sanding marks on the wood in any grit (not small swirls) but longer streaks in the direction I was sanding. I tried a different pad with the same results. I returned it (Amazon has a great no hassle return policy) and bought a Makita that work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Acester

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could start refinishing a dining room table. Works great for me. Well balanced and light weight so that I can easily do one handed sanding. Used it to strip off the finish on 6 table leaves so far. Velcro attach for sanding pads made it simple to progress from 100 grit to 220 with a super smooth finish. Just got through staining and sanding the 6 table leaves today and still impressed. Dust collector seems to work fine, but can't be certain since I am outside.
customer_reviews.author: Go Cats

customer_reviews.title: Great for Finishing, Not Super Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t remove material as rapidly as the cheap Black&Decker I had previously, but also doesn’t leave ruts (is much more “random” in it’s orbital pattern), and I can use it for hours without it heating up to where I have to turn it off to cool down. Overall, I recommend it for use on wood, but would still use a cheap B&D orbital for removing paint from a house.
customer_reviews.author: David Belais

customer_reviews.title: Very very sad.
customer_reviews.text: As others have described. Pad will not hold sandpaper. Real big issue and major flaw in unit. Been dewalt buyer for 15 plus years. Very very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new power sander
customer_reviews.text: I love my new power sander! I've never used one before and I am just getting into DIY projects. I watched a couple on videos on YouTube for guidance and was on my way to sand down some joint compound. I would like to say that I did a good job. The wall was smooth afterwards and ready for paint. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. JD

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: Love this orbital sander. I was able to sand down a butchers block and sand my 2'x4' work bench without issues. I also have a slightly cheaper porter cable, but this is lighter and feels much more comfortable in the hand. I absolutely recommend spending the extra 10 dollars and get this one if you're deciding between the two. Also, you don't need a variable speed orbital sander, it's a gimmick to get you to spend more money. This guy won't let you down.
customer_reviews.author: SirFrankoman

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was made to do
customer_reviews.text: Finally had to retire my DeWalt hand sander after years of hard use and I heard the random orbit sander worked even better and faster. It's made well, fits my grandma hands pretty well, sands like it's supposed to. The velcro sanding pads are nice and easy to switch out. I hate sanding so anything that makes it easier is a plus for me. It comes in a nice canvas bag too.
customer_reviews.author: kps27

customer_reviews.title: Looks similar to the older machines but it is not the same
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 Dewalt random orbitals. This one has 4 screws to mount the pad. All my others have 3. We wear out about 5 pads before the sander is worn out. Now I must buy a different pad for this machine. Does not fit in the boxes my older machines came in.
customer_reviews.author: d stegman

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Had the sander 3 months, unsure what is wrong. It skips, jumps- hard to hold flat on a surface.
customer_reviews.author: iwcoleman

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine
customer_reviews.text: Have put this sander through many hours of continual use and it's still going strong. The sanding disk pad still has a good bite of the disc even after close to 100 disc changes.
customer_reviews.author: ddp

customer_reviews.title: super excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: super excited to use it, cant go wrong with dewalt. the only thing I would say is homedepoe has it for 49.99 pluse tax at this point in time. but I love amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, sturdy, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This sander has delivered performance above and beyond my expectations! I’ve been doing a great deal of woodworking lately and it has kept up. Sometimes I’ll use it up to five hours in one day (not five hours uninterrupted, but total for the day). Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: L. Masters

customer_reviews.title: handy sander
customer_reviews.text: pads stick ok, sands like its supposed to i think, it is however my first sander so i don't really have anything to compare it to and i am probably not the best sander in the world either. but it works, and i can pick the speed, etc.
customer_reviews.author: E. merrill

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum while you sand. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I restore old furniture and this orbital sander is on another level. Usually dust particles are all over and cleanup is time consuming. With this product it vacuums ALOT of the sanded particles so it’s not floating around in the air. You don’t have to worry about breathing it in or coming back to a snowy/dusty wonderland. I used it for 3 hours before the vacuum bag was PACKED full.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong With DeWalt
customer_reviews.text: This is the first rotary disc sander I bought that comes with a nifty "portable" debris bag. Usually, I'm hooking up a cannister vacuum, but this one makes hard to reach, quick sanding jobs easy and I feel I got my money's worth with this purchase. Well built. Reliable. Works as advertised. I have confidence in this product. Works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Handy litte guy. Have been using it to take finish off of cupboards. Works like a champ. Does what I need it to do. The bag gets full fast, and you will get particles, but I'd rather have just a few than all of it. Dewalt is a reliable brand, and will continue to buy their products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas R.

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse Sander with Expected Dewalt Quality
customer_reviews.text: Pads are standard size, and easy to replace (velcro). Dust collection bag reduces mess, though I still avoid using this inside the house. An angle grinder with flap disk is better suited for heavy sanding or stock removal. This is great for final sanding and leaves an impressive finish - much better than you get by hand with the equivalent pad. This isn't just a time saver. At any given grit, you have smaller and lighter scratches than you would by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Rigid
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my Rigid. So much better. The Rigid would put in swirl marks, but this doesn't and seems to have a lot more torque. There is a rubber skirt that helps draw dust into the vacuum connection. My only issue is that the vacuum connector is like 1 1/4" rather than 2 1/2". An adapter will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Burns

customer_reviews.title: and a highchair and its still working beautifully. The sanding paper has not fallen off the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far Ive used this to sand down a dresser, 2 nightstands, and a highchair and its still working beautifully. The sanding paper has not fallen off the velcro once and it runs perfectly. Its exactly what I needed for the price I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Dewalt sander. Works really nice. I replaced an older model of the same sander. My old one still works fine, but I felt I needed a second one so my wife can help me to do finish work on some of my larger wood projects.
customer_reviews.author: Father

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Cabinet Refinishing Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This was AWESOME when working on my kitchen cabinets. I love this product! TIP -- If you mist the dust bag with water before you start working, it keeps the dust down.
customer_reviews.author: Tell Me...Honestly

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to buy my third
customer_reviews.text: This is my third DeWalt sander. Wore the first one out, my son kidnapped the second and here I am with the third. Quickly takes off paint or other finishes. Look on line for paper. The big box stores will rip you off big time. Don’t expect the sawdust catcher to last more than a year or so. Gets kind of messy without it but it can usually be replaced easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, add it to the shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Delightful little sander with a surprising amount of punch. Great fit and finish - feels more like an earlier-generation DeWalt tool before all of the manufacturers took that seemingly coordinated descent down the quality meter. I really dig the hook-and-loop fasteners and the palm grip, although with this model's power it can feel a bit unwieldy - just adds to the excitement!
customer_reviews.author: M. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk sander
customer_reviews.text: Warning. This is a pierce of JUNK. Does not work. Costumer service stinks as well. My second piece of junk from dewault. I returned it right away
customer_reviews.author: Catman2

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This is just soooo great. Very little dust as most of it goes into the units bag. I did hours of boat bottom sanding with this, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: It does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: I can't really think of anything I don't like about the sander. It was reasonably priced, wasn't awfully loud, kept the sanding discs securely, was easy to grip. I am not one who uses it that often so it serves me well. I'd buy it again if ever I needed another.
customer_reviews.author: WinDee

customer_reviews.title: Great sander for the money
customer_reviews.text: This sander does exactly what it is supposed to do. The dust collection system works better than most I've worked with before. The sander does tend to bog down a little bit if you put too much pressure on it, but you really shouldn't be putting a lot of pressure on the top or you'll gouge your wood. The vibration isn't bad. I've used it for 30-40 minutes straight with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: What else to say...it's dewalt.
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt never lets me down. I chose this model over the variable speed because I felt the variable speed was just one more thing that could break and I can't think of any use for it. Great product. Very comfortable to use. Well worth the price, especially with the bag included.
customer_reviews.author: K N R

customer_reviews.title: lasted about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The last two dewalt sanders I have had did not last. One at broke at 6 months, the other at lasted longer but still broke. I have ordered another one but it has been over 1 month since ordering on Amazon and I have not seen it yet!!!
customer_reviews.author: tua

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sander
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, who is in the process of painting his new house. I had tried helping him with his older sander (it was 10 years old) it made me actually shake, I didn't think I'd be able to help him much. With this new sander it was quiet and didn't shake at all. My partner tried it and said the same thing, good sander!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. It's my go to sander. Removes wood well and going through the different grits of sandpaper, leaves a beautiful finish. Dust collection is pretty good, I'd say it catches 80%-90% of the dust. I'm 6'4 and fits my hands well. Vibration is decent. If this one ever goes out, will definitely rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good Sander
customer_reviews.text: This DeWalt sander was purchased to replace my 20 year old DeWalt sander that has performed well over the years. It is starting to wear out. This new one appears to be the same quality as my first one. It runs just fine. Thanks;
customer_reviews.author: idea-thinker

customer_reviews.title: Worked awesome for refinishing a antique
customer_reviews.text: Worked awesome for refinishing a antique. Does need special sand paper meant for orbital sanders, can;t just buy a sheet of sandpaper. Otherwise works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great!!....
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic I just sanded my entire deck with this tiny monster! Its a powerful little sander.
customer_reviews.author: rennie

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Dewalt products, with no exception here. Works like a charm and does the job. Can't ask for more than that. The price was good too. Would definitely recommend to the serious wood worker.
customer_reviews.author: Don Miles

customer_reviews.title: WHO KNEW?
customer_reviews.text: Great little sander. Dust collector bag actually does a GREAT job collecting the sanding dust! First tool I've had where the little bag does more than just get in the way. Who knew! Would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInBaja

customer_reviews.title: because we like the way they work
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd or 3rd sander we have gotten...because we like the way they work...but, they never last more than a year...the last one we got was in August 2017...it died today :( There is apparently a 3 year warrenty on it...Amazon won't take it back so we're gonna have to go straight to Dewalt....just be aware...
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic palm sander
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Bosch or Makita for wood working tools, but not this time. This sander had a lower profile making it easier to handle and get into tighter spaces. The DeWalt seems more ergonomic as well. The dust collection works pretty well and the dust collection bag stays out of the way. It performs and handles beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: KAW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sander.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It replaced a couple of Porter Cable Orbital sanders that had finally worn out. I absolutely love the dust collection system. It works very well. It is comfortable to use and I'm very happy with this DeWalt sander.
customer_reviews.author: RSW

customer_reviews.title: A Lightweight and Effective Orbital Sander
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight, comfortable feel, dust-catch bag and carrying bag to keep everything organized. The only thing I didn't like was not buying the adjustable speed version for a little bit more. I especially like the carrying bag to keep the sanding disks organized. Best of all, it works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy James

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I had an older orbital sander that died so I purchased this one. Dewalt has not let me down on this one. Works great, does what it needs to do! No hesitation at all for me to recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: R. Story

customer_reviews.title: Great little sander
customer_reviews.text: After trying out a few different models of random orbital sanders at my local orange-themed big box home improvement store, I found this one to be the most ergonomically designed and comfortable to hold and operate. It worked wonders on my teak patio furniture sanding and restoration project!
customer_reviews.author: HRam

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to sand down my entire long bed dodge to paint it. Spent 2 straight days doing body work and sanding and it is going strong. Wish I could hook shopvac up where the bag goes but I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Sand your whole deck.. Why not?
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mighty hand sander to sand our whole deck... It hasn't been easy (because of the size), but at least this sander made the job do able.. Looking forward to using this sander for many more projects!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon rocks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Re-painted my spare room. I needed to do some sanding and this tool was perfect!! Easy to handle and use. I have a bunch of projects lined up and this tool is going to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turano

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I used to have one of these - unfortunately it was stolen. This replacement is not the same quality and I hate that I cant hook up my Dewalt vacuum without some adapter now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sander. I have 2 other sanders i have been using for years. They are no comparison to this Dewalt sander. I’m amazed at how good the dust collection is. There is hardly any sanding dust. I definitely recommend this sander.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Rod

customer_reviews.title: Best sander for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and low transmitted vibration. Light weight and easy paper change.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia M.

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift so I don't know if it ever been used yet. Part of my review is based on the orbital sander I have, which is a different brand, that worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronm43

customer_reviews.title: Light, fast, easy to change paper.
customer_reviews.text: Spent some time today using this orbital sander for the first time refinishing a badly stained and scratched butcher block table. Easy and fast to use and did a great job leaving no visible sanding lines. I used three different grits, rough, medium, and fine. Very easy to change paper without tools. One thing I did miss was a way to use both hands at the same time to hold the tool steady. Somehow I did not expect to be limited to using only one hand to hold the tool. Therefore, four stars rather than five. Nonetheless, I would certainly buy the same thing again for the price I paid. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: qualitydoc

customer_reviews.title: 3 AMP is overkill but worth it
customer_reviews.text: 3 AMP sander is a bit overkill but I'd rather be overpowered than underpowered. I'm a big dewalt fan so I had to add this to my toolset.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum attachment not standardized
customer_reviews.text: If these tool manufacturers ever standardize the size of their vacuum attachment points we’ll all be much happier. I had to modify the sander to accept a 1” vacuum hose which was adapted to fit my older model Dewalt orbital sander. Sheesh!
customer_reviews.author: Zapato

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sander on February 19th and the sander worked great for the 3 short times I used it. Then the belt that limits the pad speed when the pad is off of the work piece broke. This is considered a normal wear and tear item and not covered under warranty. Dewalt would not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great sander.
customer_reviews.text: The bag works very well. I used it outside with slight wind and was surprised to find how much dust the bag had collected. The bag is easy to empty out. I emptied out in the flower bed outside. Soil can use some loosening up. Grip is good. Not too big nor small. Surface comes out nice and even.
customer_reviews.author: A. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Love this sander!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Dewalt palm sander! I have small hands and it's not too big. Been sanding floors & furniture. Has an attachment that catches the sawdust. Does a great job and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KJ Warner

customer_reviews.title: Really good palm sander, just not variable speed.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was variable speed, but it's not. Regardless it is a good tool, I used it to sand my whole deck over a few days. Very good dust collection and easy to change the sanding discs.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Great sander
customer_reviews.text: I have had Three of these sanders and have been happy with all three. The model changed a bit, but still a great sander. I do lots of sanding and I will only buy Dewalt sanders
customer_reviews.author: Lance Griese

customer_reviews.title: The handle fits very comfortably in my and makes it easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to sand guitar bodies and so far it has worked perfectly. After sanding there is little to no dust in the air because of the vacuum bag attached. The handle fits very comfortably in my and makes it easy to maneuver. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wishing it was a little more aggressive but I think it's operation is pretty typical of orbital sanders
customer_reviews.text: working as described. wishing it was a little more aggressive but I think it's operation is pretty typical of orbital sanders. no vibration. very easy to control. sand collector actually works.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: This the one for me.
customer_reviews.text: I never found myself using variable speed so when i needed a new one i got this one. Its very ergonomic and has a lower hum and it seems to do the job. Dust collection is better than the older versions too. Priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Teri B Trebour

customer_reviews.title: Its a Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: My other sander stopped working so I got this. It works so much better and is easy on the hands. It is designed for less vibration and it really works! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellect Sander
customer_reviews.text: This sander is easy to hold and use, and performs like you would expect from Dewalt.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bort

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt is very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and carpal tunnel, so any sander is going to have issues for me. This is better made than the last one I had and I use it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any DIY project
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money and get this sander. I’ve run 36 grit, 140 grit, 220 grit and this joker performs. Excellent for taking varnish off of antique mahogany. Superb to remove old gel coat off of fiberglass. I have run this sander over 120 hours and it works just like the day it did the day I bought it
customer_reviews.author: CaptainPilotParrishEsq

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my wife as a birthday gift. She renews old furniture as a hobby/business and she can remove all paint/stains in no time with this little beast.
customer_reviews.author: VictorM

customer_reviews.title: Great sander / poor dust port
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it should. Not a complaint so far. Shame on DeWalt for the dust collection port. Expensive propitiatory item(s) have to be purchased to use dust collection.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love it just re did an end table and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it just re did an end table and it did the job great only thing that sucked is went through a lot of sand paper and the cord is not very long .. The table I did had spray paint in green black and yellow and was on there pretty thick and this baby helped take almost all of it off it was hard to remove paint from some of the straight edges with the round sander ..

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!

product_meta.title: DEWALT Random Orbit Sander, 5-Inch (DWE6421K)
product_meta.description: Style:SanderThe DEWALT DWE6421 5" Random Orbit Sander Kit features a 3.0 Amp motor that spins the pad at 12,000 OPM. The shorter height of this sander allows the user to get closer to work piece. It has a rubber over-mold in all of the critical areas of the sander and a separate counterweight design reduces vibration. The switch is dust-sealed to protect against dust ingestion for longer switch life. This sander offers improved dust collection and interfacing with our vacuum locking system; the dust bag has innovative one-hand locking system, the dust port is designed to fit directly to DWV010 or DWV012 dust collectors. To attach dust port to other vacs with 1-1/4" hoses use DWV9000 universal quick connector. Commonly used for sanding wood, sanding metal and sanding plastics. Includes: Sander, Owners Manual, Dust Bag, Carrying Case (bag).
